thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Beaten-Down Energy Stocks Are Poised to Power Higher

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Beaten-Down Energy Stocks Are Poised to Power Higher
text:
The first quarter wasn’t kind to energy companies: the stocks suffered their worst three-month period in three years.
Now some investors think there are bargains to be had.
Energy shares in the S&P 500 fell 6.6% in the first quarter, extending 2017’s 3.8% slide. After surging in December and January as oil prices neared $70 a barrel, the...
